title: Dr. Georg Gadow Endowed UHL Scholarship Fund
description: To provide need-based undergraduate scholarships for students enrolled in the University Honors and Leadership Program at CU Denver.  Recipients shall be first-generation students.  Preference is for UHL students pursuing the leadership studies track.
marketingContent: To provide need-based undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled in the University Honors and Leadership Program (UHL) at the University of Colorado Denver.
